full_text: Visiting NYM 5267.06F July 17, 2009 Attachment C Metropolitan Correctional Center - New York Daily Atty. Room / Visiting Room Inventory Date: 7/20/09 Inmate Name Number Unit Officer Time In Time Out Property 1 Epstein 7631854ZA 810 Filder (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) 14 9 15 Anthey clear from Brown 81131053 16 17 18 Perez clear from Perez 90898053 19 9120w53 20 The only authorized items allowed in the attorney / visiting room are a plain wedding band (without any type of stone), a religious medal (not to exceed a value of $100.00), and legal papers when necessary. i.e. co-defendant meeting. This form will be turned in daily to the Lieutenants Office upon the closing of the attorney / visiting room. After review, the Operations Lieutenant will forward to the Captain's secretary to retain on file for 30 days. Date: Time: ENW Operations Signature: Sensitive But Unclassified DOJ-OGR-00027135

text_blocks.content: Attachment C Metropolitan Correctional Center - New York Daily Atty. Room / Visiting Room Inventory
Inmate Name Number Unit Officer Time In Time Out Property

The only authorized items allowed in the attorney / visiting room are a plain wedding band (without any type of stone), a religious medal (not to exceed a value of $100.00), and legal papers when necessary. i.e. co-defendant meeting. This form will be turned in daily to the Lieutenants Office upon the closing of the attorney / visiting room. After review, the Operations Lieutenant will forward to the Captain's secretary to retain on file for 30 days.

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten entries and redactions. The redactions are marked as (b)(6) (b)(7)(C).
